name: S.F.77
description: Use your space fighter (S.F.77) to destroy enemy spaceships and collect energy from them. Use that to upgrade you speed, weapons, or improve shields which will allow you to survive even harder attack waves.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
